column4: my ubuntu server, running apf firewall is blocking my IP, even though it's in the allow/whitelists, i can connect if i stop the firewall. anyone know how i could fix this?
anything, ping, ftp or ssh. with the firewall on, it blocks all of those.
anything, ping, ftp or ssh. i have opened the ports correctly, it was working, and others can ping the server with no issues
